title: Heartbreaker
description: FBI agent Nick Buchanan is about to take his first vacation in three years when he receives a phone call from his best friend and former college roommate, Father Tom Madden. Tom relates the horrifying tale of a confession that he heard from a killer seeking absolution for a gruesome crime he has yet to commit. Worse yet, the madman, who calls himself The Heartbreaker, confesses that his intended victim is Laurant Madden, Tom's gorgeous younger sister.Length: 13 hrs and 59 mins
author: Julie Garwood
